price: 93. Say (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): "My Lord! If You would show me that with which they are threatened (torment),
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
